title: Florida man arrested in manslaughter after hole-in-one photo ID
description: Officers in Florida said they were able to track down and arrest a suspect involved in a deadly assault in a golf course parking lot by using social media.

title: 5-year-old girl dies after being struck by starting gate at harness race
description: A 5-year-old southern Illinois girl has died after a starting gate being hauled by a car prior to a harness race struck her while she was sitting in the grandstand at a county fair

title: A crash involving a freight train and a car kills 3 people in Oregon
description: Law enforcement officials say three people were killed and another person was injured when a freight train crashed into a car north of Salem, Oregon

title: Criminal intent, free speech emerge as key issues in Trump's Jan. 6 indictment
description: Trump's team asserts he believed the election was stolen and had a free speech right to say so. Jack Smith anticipated those defenses in the indictment, experts told ABC.

title: 2 injured, 4 unaccounted for after house explosion
description: Two people were injured and another four remain unaccounted for after a house exploded in New Jersey on Thursday, police said.

title: Police, protesters gather outside federal courthouse where Trump will be arraigned
description: Police, protesters and supporters of Donald Trump have gathered outside the Washington federal courthouse where the former president is set to be arraigned.

title: Who is Magistrate Judge Moxila Upadhyaya in Trump's Jan. 6 case?
description: Former President Donald Trump has been summoned to appear before Magistrate Judge Moxila Upadhyaya on Thursday for his arraignment on his third indictment.

title: NBA team donates $50K to DeSantis super PAC
description: The NBA's Orlando Magic donated $50,000 to Never Back Down, the super PAC supporting Ron DeSantis' presidential bid, according to financial records filed by this week

title: 3rd Trump ally charged with vote machine tampering as Michigan election case grows
description: A Michigan attorney and supporter former President Donald Trump has been charged in connection with voting machines in Michigan following the 2020 election, according to court records

title: Anheuser-Busch sales plummet in US amid Bud Light boycott
description: Anheuser-Busch revealed losses in an earnings release one week after imposing layoffs.

title: Texas DPS separating several fathers from families seeking asylum, attorney says
description: Texas DPS arrested several fathers seeking asylum in the U.S. last month, according to an attorney with Texas RioGrande Legal Aid.

title: WATCH:  Motorists amused as elephant says goodbye to the circus
description: Nellie or not, this elephant said goodbye to the circus and off it went, causing much amusement for motorists who spotted the runaway near a supermarket.

title: Birth control pills voluntarily recalled as FDA warns of 'reduced effectiveness'
description: The FDA is warning consumers about two lots of Tydemy, a prescription birth control pill.

title: Assault trial for actor Jonathan Majors postponed until September
description: Actor Jonathan Majors is expected to next appear in court in September on assault charges after New York City prosecutors asked a judge to delay trial proceedings

title: Man arrested after attacking flight attendant with 'sharp object' on plane: Police
description: A 39-year-old man has been arrested after an alleged attack with a “sharp object” on a flight arriving in New Orleans on Wednesday afternoon, police say.

title: Two-time champion Germany out of Women's World Cup after 1-1 draw with South Korea
description: Tow-time champion Germany has failed to reach the knockout stage for the first time at the Women’s World Cup after being held to a 1-1 draw by South Korea in a tense group finale

title: Biden calls for immediate release of Niger's president amid apparent coup
description: U.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday called for the immediate release of Niger's democratically elected head-of-state amid an apparent coup there.

title: Hyundai, Kia recall nearly 92K vehicles, tell owners to park outside due to fire risk
description: Hyundai and Kia are telling the owners of nearly 92,000 vehicles in the U.S. to park them outside because an electronic controller in an oil pump can overheat and cause fires

title: US military identifies a soldier killed in a crash on a German highway
description: The U.S. military has identified a soldier killed when a truck hit her Stryker armored vehicle on a highway in southern Germany

title: Blinken warns Russia to stop using 'food as weapon of war' in Ukraine
description: Officials from the U.S. and other countries plan to push Russia to stop using food as a “weapon,” Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Thursday

title: 13 injured in South Korea when man rams car onto sidewalk, stabs pedestrians
description: At least 13 people have been injured in South Korea when a man rammed a car onto a sidewalk and then stepped out of the vehicle and began stabbing people near a subway station in the city of Seongnam

title: Booksellers fear impending book selling restrictions in Texas
description: The law would also force stores to issue a recall on past books sold to schools that fall under a "sexually explicit" rating.

title: What to expect as Trump is arraigned on his Jan 6. indictment
description: Trump is expected to go through a swift arraignment process Thursday for his latest federal indictment

title: WATCH:  Viral video of 100-meter sprinter leads to Somali athletics official's suspension
description: The Somali Ministry of Youth and Sports has suspended the chairwoman of the country’s athletics federation after viral footage of an untrained sprinter competing in Chengdu, China, circulated online.

title: Mother of US soldier detained in North Korea says life transformed into 'nightmare'
description: The mother of a U.S. soldier held in captivity in North Korea says her life has transformed into a "big nightmare" because what happened to her son remains a mystery.

title: Russian shelling hits a landmark church in the Ukrainian city of Kherson
description: Russian shelling has damaged a landmark church in the city of Kherson that once held the remains of the renowned 18th-century commander who exerted Russian control through the southeast parts of moedern Ukraine and annexed the Crimean Peninsula

title: Highway bridge in China collapses due to flash floods and casualties are unknown
description: A highway bridge in northern China has collapsed due to flash floods triggered by heavy rains, and two cars have fallen into the river

title: Father drowns while saving his 3 kids from river
description: A 42-year-old father has drowned while saving the lives of his three children from suffering the same fate.

title: Body found in Rio Grand buoy barrier, Mexico says
description: "So far, the cause of death and nationality of the person is unknown," Mexican officials said.

title: Singapore executes third prisoner in 2 weeks for drug trafficking
description: Singapore has executed a third prisoner in two weeks for drug trafficking, despite calls for the city-state to halt capital punishment for drug-related crimes

title: WATCH:  Couple rescues pair from burning boat on Lake Michigan
description: A couple sailing on Lake Michigan rushed to the aid of a boat on fire, urging the passengers to jump into the water. The couple pulled the boaters safely out of the water.

title: Woman killed, toddler son among 3 others shot standing on sidewalk on Chicago's South Side
description: Chicago police say a 23-year-old woman has been fatally wounded and three other people — including her 2-year-old son — also have been shot on the city's South Side

title: Mexico says the first body has been spotted near a floating barrier in the Rio Grande river
description: The Mexican government says the first dead body has been spotted along the floating barriers that Texas Gov. Greg Abbott installed recently in the Rio Grande river, across from Eagle Pass

title: Tire on Delta flight pops while landing in Atlanta, 1 person injured, airline says
description: Passengers evacuated a Delta Airlines flight after a tire on a landing gear popped as the plane landed, according to the FAA.

title: $4M settlement reached with family of man who died in bed bug-infested jail cell
description: Officials in Fulton County, Georgia, agreed to a $4 million settlement with the family of a man who died in a bed bug-infested jail cell last year.
